sentences.en: Mary is the decision-maker in the house.
"By taking upon the role of adviser rather than decision maker, one does not suffer the consequences of decision fatigue," he says.
sentences.cn: “通过扮演顾问而非决策者的角色，人们不会承受决策疲劳的后果。”他表示。

sentences.en: Is there a clear decision maker who can deliver the goods?
sentences.cn: 是否有一个清晰的决策者能够履行诺言？
